#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <string>
#define rep(i,n) for( int (i)=0;(i)<(int)(n);(i)++)
#define lld long long int
#define mod 10000007

typedef long long ll;
using namespace std;
string s;
int l;
int m;
int func(int ar[],int temp[],int i)
{
		int ans=0;
//		cout<<"i is "<<i<<endl;

		for(int j=0;j<m;j++){
						if(ar[j]>0){
								int d=(j*10+(s[i]-'0'))%m;
								if(d==l)
									ans=ans+ar[j];

								temp[d]+=ar[j];
								ar[j]=0;
								//cout<<"in"<<endl;
						}else{
							ar[j]=0;

						}


				}
				temp[(s[i]-'0')%m]++;

				if((s[i]-'0')%m==l)
								ans++;
				return ans;

}
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(NULL);


		//string s;
		cin>>s;
		int q;
		cin>>q;
		while(q--)
		{
			//int m,l;
			cin>>m>>l;
		int ar[m+1];
		int temp[m+1];
			rep(i,m){
				ar[i]=0;
				temp[i]=0;

			}
			int ans=0;
			for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++)
			{
					if(i%2==0){
							ans=ans+func(ar,temp,i);
						}

					else
							ans=ans+func(temp,ar,i);


			}

			cout<<ans<<endl;
		}


}
